title: kAla kaLedevalla
sahitya:
kAla kaLedevalla jnAna baralillavalla


anupallavi

  kAlanavaru kareya bandare Enu hELali solla


caraNam 1    bAlanAgi janisi tAya molege bhramisi hAlu beNNe uNisi hasukUsu endenisi
    caraNam 2    ceNDu bugariyADi celuva vasana bEDi hiNDu duSTara kUDi krUra krtya mADi
    caraNam 3    prAyadalli sikki mAyadalli sokki strIyaroDane mikki hEya buddhili sikki
    caraNam 4    mangaLAdhInadi sikkide dainyadi kakkulate buddhi kokkadiTTu mOdadi
    caraNam 5    rAma pUjeyannu mADalillivu innu svAmi purandara viTTalanna prEmakke dUranu
